name: Marine Park Empire
description: Get ready to jump in the water as you run the most exciting and wild marine park ever in the latest and greatest sea-life simulation!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: This game was my childhood! the reason I got 100 in science! It was so underated, that I got this game along with a purchase of Koko Krunch Cereal!

I used to have the cd for this game when I was 5 and still is a good as it as back then. Goals are fantastic, hard difficulty is exactly as it entails, Sure graphics are a tad. or very outdated but the game itself is fantastic. animals are very varied, there's many attractions to show, in comparison to vanilla zoo tycoon 2 marine park empire for me is just a tad more intuitive. I wish it had mod support like zoo tycoon though, would've became alot more popular if it did
